bugBounty.title: Bug Bounty
bugBounty.description: Did you spot a bug? Let us know and there might just be something for you!
bugBounty.checkBox1: I would like to receive news and information about developments at AssetMantle.
bugBounty.checkBox2: I accept the terms and conditions

success.title: Response Submitted
success.description: The community appreciates your contribution. The Mantle team will reach out to you at the earliest.
